Question: The Raelettes' first recording session with this person was on the bluesy-gospel inflected "Leave My Woman Alone".
Hints: This person also earned another Grammy for the follow-up "Hit the Road Jack", written by R&B singer Percy Mayfield.
A $20 million performing arts center at Morehouse College was named after this person and was dedicated in September 2010.
On Fridays, the South Campus Literary Society held assemblies where this person would play piano and sing popular songs.
